mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDS (num, groupId, b_name, anon, del) VALUES(boards_seq.nextval, #{groupId}, #{b_name}, #{anon}, #{del})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM BOARDS
SELECT * FROM(SELECT num, groupId, b_name, anon, del, rownum rNum FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARDS WHERE groupId=#{groupId} ORDER BY num ASC)) WHERE rNum >= #{start} AND rNum <= #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM BOARDLIST

SELECT * FROM(SELECT boardnum, num, writer, subject, content, readcnt, re_num, ref, ref_step, ref_level, reg_date, del, rownum rNum FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARDLIST WHERE groupId=#{groupId} ORDER BY num ASC)) WHERE rNum >= #{start} AND rNum <= #{end}
